commentaryList.commText: Bangladesh skipper lifts the Trophy! Lightning doesn't strike twice but Bangladesh does read a tweet after the last ODI and who better than India would know it. India were handed out heart shattering losses in the first two ODIs but they have risen from it like a phoenix and have handed the hosts a pasting. It was all about Kishan. Superlatives and adjectives will be adorning his name today. But for India, they will need a few quick fixes as the next fifty overs WC ain't too far away given there would be Tests, T20Is and an IPL sandwiched before that. Over to some attritional red ball cricket now or there would be some bazball adventure as well? That's it from our team of B0$ This isB1$ signing off. Toodles.

formatValue: Sagar Chawla, Abhinand Raghavendran and Siva.

commentaryList.commText: B0$ The way Ishan and Virat batted, that cost us the game. The way Ishan batted, hats off to him. Our bowlers tried our best but there was no way out on this wicket. Had we been chasing 330-340, it would have been a different ball game. They are a good side. We played good cricket and will help our confidence.

B0$ They are a good side in every format. Last couple of years we have been doing well. We have a World Cup in front and we can do well next year. We have lot of senior guys. They are supporting us. We gain confidence. We want to get better. I try to think positive every time.

B0$ I think it was a perfect wicket to bat on. Perfect situation for me as well. Was looking to watch the ball properly and go with the flow. I think when you have so many senior players in the team. We have been doing conversations. Here at the international stage, you try to get a lot when you get a few. I got a lot of help from the support staff. I was just picking the ball and the bowlers. Things went my way. After looking at the wicket, I knew it was going to play well. Was trying to smash the loose balls. There is so much conversation going on in the team for the fitness.

B0$ This was expected from our team. Virat and Kishan set it up for us. The scores don't suggest that the way he started off. He grabbed the opportunity with both hands. He batted brilliantly. Virat also used his experience and guided him. You know that the batters will come hard and you will get wickets. There was not much help. We took some brave chances. Very happy with our performance. We are learning as a team. Still try to get better. Unfortunate, the results didn't go our way in the first two games. We would want to take the confidence into the Test series.
India's takeaway would be Kishan and Sundar's performances. Bangladesh's takeaway would be Litton's captaincy, Mehidy's all-round skills.

B0$ Indian bowlers have done a quick wrap up of the Bangladesh innings. Chasing 410, Bangladesh got off to a quick start but it was a matter of time before they crumbled under the chasing rate. Anamul triggered the procession and it stopped with the wicket of Mustafizur. The bowlers were relentless just like Kishan's batting earlier in the day. The game was set up by him as he out-batted Bangladesh out of the game. India had a lot of questions to answer and they must have answered a few thanks to that destructive knock. In the era of bazballness, have India stumbled upon a formula? Only time will tell. For Bangladesh, their fortress at home might have developed a few cracks but it is still unbreachable. They have taken the series 2-1. The final presentation in a bit.

Umran Malik to Mustafizur, B0$ Bowled!! All over! India complete the decimation. India have humbled Bangladesh by 227 runs. Was a quick delivery at the sticks and Mustafizur backed away to heave it but missed it. Malik was all pumped up and shows India had all the intensity despite losing the series. B1$
Umran Malik to Mustafizur, B0$ Bowled!!
Umran Malik to Taskin Ahmed, 1 run, short ball, banged in, Taskin Ahmed looks to pull and gets a top-edge for the ball to land over the bowler. They get a single
Umran Malik to Mustafizur, 1 run, short ball, outside off, dabbed down to third man for a single
Umran Malik to Mustafizur, B0$, fuller length delivery, Mustafizur backs away and slaps that through the off-side for a four. That was hit hard and into the gap
Umran Malik to Mustafizur, byes, B0$, and those are byes! That decks in sharply and Mustafizur backed away. The batter tried to dab it but missed for the ball to roll past the keeper for four byes
Umran Malik to Mustafizur, no run, fuller length delivery, angled in, Mustafizur looks to clip that and misses. Was a fast delivery and angled in
Kuldeep Yadav to Mustafizur, 1 run, tossed up delivery, pushed down to long-off for a single
Kuldeep Yadav to Taskin Ahmed, 1 run, short ball, chopped out into the off-side for a single
Kuldeep Yadav to Taskin Ahmed, B0$, wow! Clobbered as that was tossed up outside off. Kneels down and slams the slog sweep over deep mid. Was hit flat and over the fence
Kuldeep Yadav to Taskin Ahmed, no run, flatter delivery, Taskin Ahmed defends it out into the off-side
Kuldeep Yadav to Mustafizur, 1 run, kneels down and slog sweeps the ball down to deep square for a single
Kuldeep Yadav to Mustafizur, no run, gets behind the line of the delivery and defends it out into the off-side as that was a flatter one at the sticks

miniscore.lastWicket: Mustafizur Rahman   b Umran Malik 13(17)  - 182/10 in 33.6 ov.
